lead_paragraph: State Senator James Sanders Jr. has asked for the governor to appoint a special prosecutor to investigate a shooting after residents said officers were barging into their homes.

headline.print_headline: Legislator Asks Cuomo for Inquiry Into Killing by Police in Queens
headline.main: Legislator Asks Cuomo for Inquiry Into Killing by Police in Queens

snippet: State Senator James Sanders Jr. has asked for the governor to appoint a special prosecutor to investigate a shooting after residents said officers were barging into their homes.
abstract: New York Sen James Sanders Jr asks Gov Andrew Cuomo to appoint special prosecutor to investigate shooting of armed man George Tillman by police in South Ozone Park, Queens.
